environment.SPACK_DEPENDENCIES: ^openblas@0.3.18/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' openblas@0.3.18 % gcc@10.2.0 ~ilp64 threads=none) ^netlib-scalapack@2.1.0/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' netlib-scalapack@2.1.0 % gcc@10.2.0 ^openmpi@4.1.3
environment.SPACK_SPEC: cosma@2.5.1 % gcc@10.2.0 ~cuda ~ipo ~rocm +scalapack ^openblas@0.3.18/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' openblas@0.3.18 % gcc@10.2.0 ~ilp64 threads=none) ^netlib-scalapack@2.1.0/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' netlib-scalapack@2.1.0 % gcc@10.2.0 ^openmpi@4.1.3
